text: AUCTION Price of $51, 400 Reflects the County Appraised Value ONLY Not the Reserve or List Price. This property is being sold at auction, do not make offers to purchase prior to the sale based on this amount. For more information and our online bidding, please visit our website KaufmanAuctionsWV 157+/- Acre Doddridge County, WV Land. Premier Hunting Property. Location: 800 Pike Fork, Salem, WV 26426. Bidding is open & begins closing on Monday, February 10th, at 7:00 P.M. Open House: Thursday, February 6th from 12:00 - 2:00 P.M. 157+/- Acre | 3 Bed 2 Bath Trailer | Well Water and 500 Gallon Holding Tank for Sewage | Seller states free gas | Surface Only. A unique opportunity to own a slice of the great outdoors with this sprawling 157+/- acre property. Nestled in the heart of nature, this land includes a 3-bedroom trailer, ideal for a hunting camp or country living. In 2006, the property underwent selective timbering to a 20" diameter, which cultivated logging roads throughout for better access, while the youthful timber promises a profitable return in the future. The horseshoe shape creates a perfect sanctuary for wildlife, making it a haven for hunting enthusiasts. The well-maintained trail that encircles the perimeter ensures excellent access to all corners of the property. Thanks to a granted right of way through the adjacent land owned by the McClains, this property enjoys expanded access, enhancing its appeal. Whether you're looking for an exceptional hunting camp or envisioning it as your primary residence with nature as your backyard, this property offers both possibilities. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to invest in a property that offers both a peaceful retreat and potential financial return. Doddridge County, Deed Book 389 Page 642, District 5 Map 13 Parcel 28, District 5 Map 19 Parcel 3, Legal Description: PIKE FK 82.25 AC 82 AC 40 PO and PIKE FK 76.75 AC. 2024 Taxes $357 (Including house and lot that will be separated from property). Kaufman Realty & Auctions of WV. 399 W. Main St. Bridgeport, WV 26330. David Anthony Kaufman, Broker. License #WV0030037. James Yoder, CAI - Auctioneer/REALTOR. License #WVS200300965. Auc. Lic. #2375

text: Very nice well kept home with a beautiful lake view. Do not miss your chance on this great home on a lake. Lake Floyd is a private club (Not an HOA) that every prospective applicated must be approved for membership. Completion of an application and a background check is required before purchasing property. Lake Floyd offers a variety of amenities to all members, including; fishing, tennis, basketball, swimming, bike riding, and other activities. The Application Process Fee is $600.00, a background check fee of $55.00 is nonrefundable. Yearly dues are $650.00 per lot. Both application and background check fees must be paid before processing.

text: This gorgeous 3 bedroom 2 bath home situated on nearly 70 acres of pristine land in Doddridge Co has it all. Featuring a 16x30 in-ground pool for those hot summer days. The pond sits just a few feet beyond the pool and is stocked and ready for your fishing line to be dropped in. Featuring a newer dock with benches for sitting and watching the wild life. The whole house generator offers the peace of mind knowing you will be able to heat and cool your home even when mother nature is not cooperating. Additionally this home also offers a two stall detached garage, complete with heat and a functioning bathroom. For the outdoor enthusiast there are plenty of hunting opportunities with 2 hunting shanty's that need some mild TLC. The lean-to shed offers additional storage for your outdoor toys. High speed internet is available for the telecommuter, all of this a 30 minute drive to Bridgeport. Free Gas APO.

text: Discover your dream retreat with this expansive 4BR, 2.5BA ranch home gracefully set on a serene 1 acre lot & boasting a wonderful in-law garage apartment. As you step inside, the original oak flooring throughout seamlessly complements the open concept living & dining areas. Arched windows & French doors embrace the space in natural light, offering picturesque views of the tranquil countryside. The kitchen features modern appliances & ample counter & cabinet space. Adjacent to the kitchen is the sunroom providing a peaceful space to relax. The primary serves as a private retreat, boasting an ensuite equipped w/jacuzzi tub & direct access to the backyard pagoda. 3 additional BR & full BA complete space of the main level. The LL reveals a secondary living space, complete w/2nd kitchen, bonus room, laundry room, & half BA. Updated from the previous listing, this property now incorporates the additional property of (.28 acre ) which includes a 24x30 garage complete w/1 BR apartment featuring custom oak flooring & walls, a spacious living room, equipped kitchen, washer/dryer hook up, full BA. Enjoy the landscape of the countryside from the wraparound deck overlooking an expansive yard, offering ample space for all outdoor activities. Updated for energy efficiency with a Trane heat pump/AC & durable metal roof, & conveniently located within 20 minutes of Clarksburg, this property is a perfect blend of peaceful living and accessibility. Don't miss the chance to own this hidden gem!
nearby_schools: Harrison County Schools
